title: Client keeps bugging out and laging
body: My client keeps bugging out and lagging. my internet is fine no other game does this, and I just had my company look at my internet for the 3rd time because of league. but league is the only thing that does this. my pc is great, and runs better games with greater requirements with no issue. The league clients keeps lagging when i try to lock into a champ or ban it wont let me or it just pauses. I even have all the settings at the lowest possible. now Im in a 20 minutes low priority queue simply because the damn client keeps lagging out and stopping me form lbannign and selecting a champ. even the chat lags very badly. How do I fix this? I have tired all of riots recommended trouble shooting, but It hasnt fixed it, andim ready to leave the game its gotten so bad

replies.body: What do you mean by bugging out?  Is this specifically happening in-game or during champion select?  Is this on the updated client?  Are you using any third party programs like play.tv?  Let me know, and I'll be happy to help!
